summary.span: 获取一个设计时对象，该对象表示与设计图面上的 对象关联的控件。

value.span: 设计时对象，该对象表示与 相关联的控件。

span.span: The design-time object representing the control associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器使用属性来检索设计时对象，该对象表示与设计图面上的对象关联的控件 。The property is used by the designer to retrieve the design-time object representing the control that is associated with the object on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象占用的非托管资源，还可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Expressions As ExpressionBindingCollection

summary.span: 获取当前控件在设计时的表达式绑定。

span.span: Gets the expression bindings for the current control at design time.

value.span: 一个 集合，包含为当前控件中的属性设置的表达式字符串。

span.span: An that contains the expressions strings set for properties in the current control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计宿主（如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] ）使用 类来获取 类，以便 在设计时获取用于设置控件属性的表达式。The design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the class to get the class to get the to set expressions for control properties at design time. 表达式字符串引用可本地化的资源、应用程序设置、连接字符串或自定义表达式类型。Expression strings reference a localizable resource, an application setting, a connection string, or a custom expression type. 对于具有关联的表达式字符串的每个控件属性，集合都包含一个元素。The collection contains an element for each control property that has an associated expression string. 每个元素的每个属性指示关联的表达式生成器实现。Each property for each element indicates the associated expression builder implementation. 表达式字符串由其关联的进行分析和计算， 以在运行时确定控件属性值。The expression string is parsed and evaluated by its associated to determine the control property value at run time.

span.span: ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: The control element for design.

summary.span: 初始化设计器并设置用于设计的组件。

span.span: Initializes the designer and sets the component for design.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法应由设计器宿主调用以初始化设计器。The method should be called by the designer host to initialize the designer.

para.span: 在初始化期间，使用 属性上的和方法 将属性映射到样式。

span.span: During initialization, use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles.

[<System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is ControlDesigner.Tag. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")>]

summary.span: 当某个行为与该元素关联时被调用。

span.span: Called when a behavior is associated with the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 方法已过时。The method is obsolete. 使用 属性上的和方法 可将属性映射到样式。Use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles. 使用 类的方法在 设计时设置控件的样式。Use the method on the class to set styles for the control at design time. 重写 方法，以便在设计时操作控件的初始样式。Override the method to manipulate the initial styles for the control at design time.

para.span: 可以重写并实现方法，以便在将行为附加到设计器时执行附加处理。

span.span: The method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when a behavior is attached to the designer.

[<System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is ControlDesigner.Tag. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")>]

summary.span: 当某个行为与该元素取消关联时被调用。

span.span: Called when a behavior disassociates from the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 方法已过时。The method is obsolete. 使用 属性上的和方法 可将属性映射到样式。Use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles. 使用 类的方法在 设计时设置控件的样式。Use the method on the class to set styles for the control at design time. 重写 控件设计器的方法，以便在发布设计器对象之前执行操作。Override the method for the control designer to perform actions before the designer object is released.

para.span: 在从设计器分离行为时，可以重写和实现 M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner OnBehaviorDetaching 方法，以执行附加处理。

span.span: The M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorDetaching method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when a behavior is detached from the designer.
ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is to handle the Changed event on the DataBindings collection. The DataBindings collection allows more control of the databindings associated with the control. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")]

[<System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is to handle the Changed event on the DataBindings collection. The DataBindings collection allows more control of the databindings associated with the control. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")>]

span.span: The name of the property that has changed.

summary.span: 提供可用于指示数据绑定更改时间的方法。

span.span: Provides a method that can be used to indicate when a data binding has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计 器更改控件的数据绑定后，应由控件设计器调用方法。The method should be called by a control designer after the control designer has made a change to the data bindings for the control. > [!NOTE] > 方法已过时。The method is obsolete. 对于等效的控件设计器功能，请使用集合上的事件。Use the event on the collection for equivalent control designer functionality.

para.span: 此 方法可以重写并实现，以便在控件的数据绑定集合发生更改时执行附加处理。

span.span: The method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when the data bindings collection for the control has changed.
ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSetParent() cil managed
abstract member OnSetParent : unit -> unit override this.OnSetParent : unit -> unit

summary.span: 提供一种在将关联控件附加到父控件时执行附加处理的方式。

span.span: Provides a way to perform additional processing when the associated control is attached to a parent control.

para.span: 当设计器附加到父控件时，可以重写和实现该方法，以执行附加处理。

span.span: The method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when the designer is attached to a parent control.
ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterEvents(class System.Collections.IDictionary events) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterEvents (events As IDictionary)

param.name: events
param.span: 包含要公开的组件的事件名称的 。

span.span: An that contains the names of the events of the component to expose.

summary.span: 设置在设计时为用于组件的 对象公开的事件列表。

span.span: Sets the list of events that are exposed at design-time for the object for the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种方法，用于向设计器通过对象公开的事件字典中添加项或从中移除项 。The method provides a way to add items to or remove items from the dictionary of events that a designer exposes through a object. 事件字典中的键是事件的名称。The keys in the dictionary of events are the names of the events. 对象的类型为 。The objects are of type .

para.span: 可以直接修改可通过访问的字典，也可以 使字典保持不变。

span.span: You can directly modify the dictionary that is accessible through or you can leave the dictionary unchanged.

para.span: 如果要重写 方法，请在执行您自己的筛选之前调用基实现。

span.span: If you are overriding the method, call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.
ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

para.span: 如果要重写 方法，请在执行您自己的筛选之前调用基实现。
